FuncDef: Identifies filter policy of multicast groups to be applied to this MVR VPLS. The sources of the multicast traffic must be a member of the MVR VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the routing policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters excluding double quotes. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Routing policies are configured in the config>router>policy-options context The router policy must be defined before it can be imported.
